> 
> In these situations, I've had good success with DbUnit:
> 
>    http://dbunit.sourceforge.net/
> 
> I like that you don't have to write SQL to add/delete data.  
> Instead, you create a dataset in light-weight XML, and DbUnit 
> takes care of how to add and delete the data in that dataset.


Is anyone aware of a similar tool for C#/.NET?
subject: RE: [junit] Setting up database for unit testing
